Hugh T Nelson Sanitarium--R B Nelson Home--Charles Minor Home--Stedman House Antiques

Brick I-House with Center Gable with Wings, 3 Bay, T-Plan, 5 Course American Bond, 5 Course American with Flemish Variant Bond in Wings and T, Slate Roof on Center and T, Wood Shingles on Wings, Rivens, Reciprocating Saw Marks, 6 Panel Doors, Symmetrical Trim, Rondel Blocks, 6/6, 9/9, Blinds, Barred Cellar Window
